OOC: JP, dont forget Starscream. He fired 25 hsots from each gun at Nighteyes.

:::Torca/Sideswipe/Ratchet/Sky Lynx

::Torca destroys the missles, but was hit by both stinger missles and all of 
the optic blasts. he fired 9 explosive shells at Double Punch, 8 at Injector, 
and 8 at Ares::
~~~~~
::Sideswipe destroyed the missles, but was hit by the grenade dead on::
Sideswipe: AHHHHH!
::He fired 1 missle and 13 shots at Double Punch and 1 missle and 12 shots at 
Ares:
~~~~~
::Ratchet was hit by 2 ion disks and both stinger missles, now bleeding 
heavily. He fired 15 shots from one gun and 1 tusk missle at Manterror and 15 
shots from his other gun and 1 tusk missle at Bumblebee, determined to 
survive this battle::
~~~~~
::Sky Lynx was hit by the stinger missles and 3 of the concussion blasts. His 
cargo carrier was damaged badly, and it couldnt take hits from him any more. 
he fired 2 missles from one gun at Bumblebee and 2 from his other gun at 
Sixshot::

--part1_c7.542bd43.2785428b_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
